name: Escape from the asylum
description:
After being diagnosed with scriotone, the young Zokol went to the asylum, where he was supposed to be being chased by a creature that was there 2 meters tall with elongated arms. Find the cards and try to survive as fast as possible!

I'm Daniel Lopes, I'm sixteen years old, I've been programming at 7mind for 2 months, I live in the DF capital of Brazil.
